channel.title: Help running client
channel.description: Ok, well basicly i play a server and i downloaded the client and it loaded perfectly and everything works fine for me. but then my mate tryed to play aswell and he downloaded the client fine but then when he double clicks run it says in the CMD "Can't find main client.class program will exit" so it can't be the server because it works fine for me.. can anyone help solve this problem??

item.title: Help running client
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Did the download finish? Tell him to re-download it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help running client
item.dc:creator: @Jr_Satan Jr Satan
item.description:
@Jr_Satan wrote:

Ok, well basicly i play a server and i downloaded the client and it loaded perfectly and everything works fine for me. but then my mate tryed to play aswell and he downloaded the client fine but then when he double clicks run it says in the CMD “Can’t find main client.class program will exit” so it can’t be the server because it works fine for me… can anyone help solve this problem??
